sentence.Network_en: They started strolling down the dusty road in the moonlight.
sentence.Network_cn: 在月光下他们开始沿着满是尘土的路漫步。

sentence.Network_en: Meanwhile, Dusty Springfield's new TV series began a run on BBC 1.
sentence.Network_cn: 同时，达斯蒂·斯普林菲尔德的电视剧新作开始在BBC1台播放。

sentence.Network_en: The bus from Odense rattled into a dusty village called Pozo Almonte.
sentence.Network_cn: 从欧登塞来的巴士颠簸着驶入一个叫作波索阿尔蒙特的灰蒙蒙的村庄。

jx.jx_en_mean: (Brit. informal, dated)(of a person's health or situation) fairly good
jx.jx_cn_mean: (英，非正式，旧)（人的健康或境况）还不错

entry.tran: (通常指因为少雨而)布满灰尘的,满是尘土的
entry.def: If places, roads, or other things outside are dusty, they are covered with tiny bits of earth or sand, usually because it has not rained for a long time.

example.ex: They started strolling down the dusty road in the moonlight.
example.tran: 在月光下他们开始沿着满是尘土的路漫步。

entry.tran: (房子、物件等)覆有灰尘的,尘封的
entry.def: If a room, house, or object is dusty, it is covered with very small pieces of dirt.

example.ex: The books looked faded, dusty and unused.
example.tran: 那些书看上去褪了色,尘封已久。

means.word_mean: 1. covered with a layer of dusty;

auth_sentence.content: Little dusty farms came and went in a flash.
auth_sentence.res_content: Little dusty farms came and went in a flash.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Little dusty farms came and went in a flash.

auth_sentence.content: Baboons played on the dusty track ahead of us.
auth_sentence.res_content: Baboons played on the dusty track ahead of us.

means.word_mean: 布满灰尘的,灰尘弥漫的

sentences.en: He spent his weekends poking around dusty old bookshops.
sentences.cn: 他周末都泡在布满尘埃的旧书店里。

sentences.en: He was pulling dead roots from the dusty earth.
sentences.cn: 他正在从土中拔出枯死的根茎。

sentences.en: His black hat was the brown color of the earth and his clothes were dusty and torn.
sentences.cn: 他的黑帽成了土褐色,衣服也又脏又破。

means.word_mean: (对要求或问题)轻率的回绝，毫无用处的回答

sentences.en: When I asked the company what their policy was on this matter, I received a very dusty answer.
sentences.cn: 我问这家公司对这件事采取什么政策，结果得到了一个毫无用处的回答。
